Package org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.nfs.nfs3

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncDataService
    This class is a thread pool to easily schedule async data operations.
    AsyncDataService.WriteBackTask
    A task to write data back to HDFS for a file.
    DFSClientCache
    A cache saves DFSClient objects for different users
    DFSClientCache.DFSInputStreamCaheKey  
    Nfs3
    Nfs server.
    Nfs3HttpServer
    Encapsulates the HTTP server started by the NFS3 gateway.
    Nfs3Metrics
    This class is for maintaining the various NFS gateway activity statistics and publishing them through the metrics interfaces.
    Nfs3Utils
    Utility/helper methods related to NFS
    OffsetRange
    OffsetRange is the range of read/write request.
    OpenFileCtx
    OpenFileCtx saves the context of one HDFS file output stream.
    OpenFileCtx.CommitCtx  
    OpenFileCtxCache
    A cache saves OpenFileCtx objects for different users.
    PrivilegedNfsGatewayStarter
    This class is used to allow the initial registration of the NFS gateway with the system portmap daemon to come from a privileged (< 1024) port.
    RpcProgramNfs3
    RPC program corresponding to nfs daemon.
    WriteCtx
    WriteCtx saves the context of one write request, such as request, channel, xid and reply status.
    WriteManager
    Manage the writes and responds asynchronously.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OpenFileCtx.COMMIT_STATUS  
    WriteCtx.DataState
    In memory write data has 3 states.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WriteManager.MultipleCachedStreamException
